column1: I just got this product I have been using for a few that it seems like is working very well [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have gotten months of use, applying this every other night, in rotation with my Rx Retinoid. My skin is VISIBLY smoother and clearer in the morning after using this, and my pores appear smaller. My only hesitation in repurchasing would be the price. Paula's Choice and Alpha are competitors at a lower cost. Olay would have a unique drugstore home run product if they were to re-release this at say, the $20-$25 mark.

Please don't discontinue the Nightly Purifying Micro-Peel. I have been using it for years, and it's the best night cream/anti-aging serum you have. It is also free of fragrance and parabens, which many knowledgeable customers are looking for these days. It has many great reviews on many sites/magazines, so I can't be the only one who will miss it! You will lose me as a customer once this goes, as I see you are adding fragrance and parabens to your newer products. Please reconsider.

I was able to use this at least 2 times a week and my skin really started to look terrific! My overall skin appearance looked fresh and fantastic and my make-up has never looked so good! I'm going to be a frequent buyer of this product. I loved it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love! Highly recommend this product, it will bring all the 'yuck' to the surface rapidly so turning the rate your skin renews from 28days to (I'm guessing) to a 14 day turn over but the end results are worth the, possible break out , but after it clears your skin in all fresh, new, firm, &looking youthful! ;)

I've experienced fantastic results with this product. I've never used a 'peel' product before, but there are noticeable (and very positive) changes in my skin over the 6 weeks I've been using the product. My pores are smaller, fine lines diminished and my skin is much more radiant. I'm thrilled with the outcome! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this micro-peel product! I am on my second bottle of it, and my skin has never looked better! I live in Florida and have a convertible, so my face gets a lot of sunshine. This product evens out my skin tone and leaves it very healthy looking! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've noticed that the bottle is manufactured differently, depending on where you purchase (Amazon, Target, Walmart). Don't know which is the newer one. One shows actual dropper bulb on bottle, where the other one is hidden. Don't know which is newer. When I find out, I will rate properly. Why does this say I'm 12. It gives option for Birth Month... When submitting it says age 12. I'm 54.

this product has worked wonders and now my face is acne free and spots are faded.I tried other products, but non of them came close to this. Thank you for providing great products that actually work! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using the Pro-X Nightly Purifying Micro-Peel for 3 nights I have noticed less visible pores and a smoother complexion ...I'm sold! It is great to find a product that stands up to its claims, the results can't be denied. I have used Olay product for over 15 years and while I have tried other more costly brands I ALWAYS come back to Olay. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product. My skin feels so clean and fresh after use. I love the way my face looks after I use it. It feels soft and firm. There is nothing I don't like about Pro-X micro-peel. My skin just keeps improving over time. Love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product so much that I gave some to my son's elementary school teacher who had just turned 40. I had put a lot of different skincare items in her gift bag, but the next day she was so excited to tell me that the Pro-X Nightly Purifying Micro-Peel had transformed her skin overnight! She too noticed a difference upon waking up like I do each morning after I use it. It somehow smooths and plumps the skin while you sleep. LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After just one week of using this product, my skin is smoother, remarkably softer and brighter. My coworkers are asking what I am using so they have noticed the change in my skin. This product is a keeper. Thank you. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using this for almost 2 weeks, I noticed a definite difference in the overall appearance of my skin. I just looked younger and more rested! My skin tone was much more even and the lines in my face were much less noticeable. There was a plumper appearance to my skin as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

so far I like it. I have not seen any immediate difference but the company was pestering me for a review the very same week I got the sample.I was trying to wait till I had used it a while. it feels good on the skin, I have very sensitive skin, it doesn't burn and I have not broke out. the dropper was a bit of a learning curve but its fine now. I will continue to use the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Skin feels softer and fine lines are lessened.I also have a nice glow to my skin. I am 54 and I was at a dinner last night and a gentleman told me I looked like I was in my early 40's. Love the Olay product line. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product every night for the last two weeks and I love the way my skin looks! Every morning I wake up to fresh, younger looking skin. My pores look smaller and skin tone more even. Fine line don't exist anymore! My 12 year old said I look like I'm 20 not 46! Thanks Olay you have done it again! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for several weeks. I do a slight difference in my overall tone of my skin. I am not really sure what improvements I am to see. But I would like to see with continued use, if there is more changes. I am a faithful Olay product user. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely loved this product! My skin is softer and clearer..and I had a brown spot that has lightened considerably. I will certainly purchase this product once I am out of my sample! Thank you, Olay! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this for about two weeks now, and my skin texture has noticeably improved. My skin is smoother, more even, and feels plumper, somehow. There is a slight stinging sensation when the product is first applied, and it can be a bit drying. I use a night cream over this, and it feels great. The packaging for this product may be my favorite part: the cap measures out a perfect amount for each use, which takes all the guess work out of it. Such a great design! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am still trying to find the right product that "works for me". I used this daily for 2 weeks and did not see significant results. Its very gentle. I had no tingling, redness or exfoliating effect. Packaging/pump was unique and a good feature. The main thing I am trying to target is hyperpigmentation. I have not seen any improvement using this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been blessed with pretty good skin to begin with, but the fine lines and wrinkles are starting to show. In 5 days I did notices an improvement to the texture of my skin. I can't say that I noticed the softening of any lines. I will be interested to see what a month of product use will accomplish. Worth trying if you don't want to go to the dermatologist, but it's not photoshop. Have realistic expectations. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The peel was easy to apply, and dried quickly. Certain area tingled/stung a little upon application, but it subsided quickly. After washing with Olay cream cleanser to remover the micro-peel, skin was noticeably refreshed looking, as if I had a professional facial. This was after just the first application, improved results followed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love it excellent product.I would tell everyone to use.I have used all your product sence I was 27 I. 45 and my friends ask me what I use because I look so young. My Friend told me about Olay one day I looked at her face,She's 50 and asked her why she glows she told ma about Olay and I been a keeper ever seems. Love my Olay

It's still pretty early but I think this project will work well. It does not burn or itch. Goes on smoothly and works well in between my nighttime routine of facewashing and applying of Olay facial moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Great non irritating overnight glycolic acid product. I loved the moisturizing benefits and the fact that after a week my skin looked brighter. I have high hopes for continued improvement. I would like to see Olay follow this up with Glycolic Acid pads to further improve my skin tone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The appearance of my skin is actually better. I was skeptical at first, but the pores on my nose and forehead look much clearer, and my cheeks feel and look moisturized. I have combination skin: t-zone with really dry cheeks, and I see improvement in both areas. I was afraid it would dry out my cheeks even more, but I was wrong. I recommend giving this a try. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like that it seems to tighten my skin without the skin feeling tight. I have only just begun using it so I have not seen long term results yet. I have been an Olay gal since I was 21 so thanks for the free sample. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Packaging- I thought I boke the top off at first. But I like the concept of measured out for you. I never know if I am using too much or too little. Product- After first night of use my skin was super soft and my blush stayed on all day! Day 7 - my skin was super soft and it looked a bit brighter! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this for maybe 10 nights.. I wash my face at & then follow the easy directions, using 2 drops & I don't even need my nightly lotion... I've noticed my 2 age spots are fading & pores are shrinking... I really love it & appreciate the full sample! Thank you Olay.!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The product felt like it was really working but my skin was very dry. I really had the need to apply my nightly moisturizer on top of this specific product. I believe that I still have to use it more to be able to see better/more noticeable results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It's OK but if you have some where to go the next day , you will be all red .You felt tingling right after you put it on. I do not know if that is a good or bad thing . I love Olay products and have been using them since I was a teenager. I do not look my age by far thanks to Olay , but I'm just not sure on this product I will give it another shot. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I appreciate being chosen to review. After 5 days, I did notice a difference in my skin - I used on my face, neck and hands - not only were they smoother, but some blemishes diminished slightly as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just got my sample a few days ago, but my face feels and looks smooth and refreshed. Loved the bottle design. the product absorbs very quickly. Just need more time to see the results but I'm sure they'll be great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've only been using this for less than a week. I've seen some brightening in my skin, so will keep using. There no dramatic overnight effect, but I wasn't expecting any. I do like the applicator. It provides a consistent amount, that is just enough to provide an even coat with wasting any. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product has the right balance of gentle exfoliation. I do use a moisturizer afterward, and I can see it helps the moisturizer to get into my skin better. I wake up with glowing, even tone, and soft skin from first night using it, and it continues to improve over the next few night of usage. I love just adding one step in my skincare routine will have such good result. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Although I have only had this product for 4 days I see a difference in the lines in my face. I am 34 with the usual aging…mostly my frown line between my brows and smile lines on my cheeks. Using this product for just the past 4 nights has shown improvement on these lines…a lot actually. The product is slightly stick at first but is not a problem wearing to bed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was pleasantly surprised how smooth my face looked after just one night of use. The fine lines around my eyes even looked more diminished. My skin tone also seemed more evened out. I will definitely purchase this product in the future. The one very small drawback was that my face a little tacky upon application, so I would recommend giving it some time to dry before bed and not using your favorite pillowcase. Still would not give up this product over that!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have tried many different face serums and this one tops them all. I noticed results almost immediately after I began using it, my fine lines were not as noticeable and my skin has a younger softer appearance to it!! I also love the way it leaves my skin feeling so soft! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've always been skeptical about wonder products that make claimed that make claimd and dont deliver. However I was presently surprised. I saw better looking skin in 10 dsys [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

For a specialized product with a strong brand name behind it, this product from Olay is a good one. A tad expensive, but a nice "extra"beauty product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have used it many times. I love it. My face feels soft and looks young. I have gotten many compliments on how I look younger than i really am! I'm 55 and I have few wrinkles.
This has made a big difference in the overall appearance of my skin. I have noticed like fine lines under my eyes and my skin feels hydrated and healthy. So impressed!

This is amazing!! Made me feel younger after just one use. I love how you get to peel it off. While you are removing it from your face you are also peeling away all those dead skin cells. I willl definetly purchase more.!!!!

I love the way my face looks and feels after using the micro peel. I recommend this product to all my family and friends.it has made a big difference in the way I feel about me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've used the product for two weeks. So far no one has noticed any change, however I feel like my dark spot is fading and that my overall completion looks healthier. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this product when my skin is feeling a little rough. The micro beads and texture of the cream is awesome. My skin feels smooth after using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have been using this produce for a month and I can see a noticeable decrease in the sagging skin and wrinkles under my chin and neck [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It was a good product but not superb, maybe someone younger or with a different skin type would disagree. What works for one may not work for another & vise versa. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
i wake up and my skin is so awsome i am older and this product makes you look at least 5 to 8 yrs younger [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
After just one week I could see a difference in my skin. Discoloration was fading and lines were softer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have only been using it for a few weeks so it is hard to tell, but I can feel a tingle when I apply it. No pain or itching though. Time will tell. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love this product! My skin looks so much smoother and softer. I will absolutely buy this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really liked how this made my skin look, feel with every use. I saw the dark spots slowly disappear and my skin looked more brighter. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've been using the product for a few weeks. My skin absorbs my moisturizer better and feels more plump and dewy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Works well but my skin does not like glycerin so I had some breakouts and I had to stop using the product. I passed it on to my sister who absolutely loved it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Haven't used it long enough to see the effects. Super easy to apply, no irritation, pleasant smell. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the Olay Pro-X anti aging peel. It was easy to use. My face felt fresh and smooth. I had noticed a smooth skin with less wrinkles after using the product for a week. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Been using the product for several days, my skin does feel smoother, other than that not much of difference. I've been an Oil of Olay user for decades, great products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product makes my skin feel great, and it is soooo easy to use. I love that it doesn't add any time to my daily routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like the light texture and feel of this peel. It dries quickly and helps minimize lines and wrinkles. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love this new ProX product! My skin is noticeably smoother, my pores are smaller and my skin tone is more even. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Using this product just once a day improved the look of my skin. My skin looks brighter and my pores are smaller. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
My skin feels softer & looks smoother after just a week. I'm looking forward to seeing the long-term results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've been using the product for about 2 weeks difference in my skinare slight but I will keep using for optimal results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Olay ProX is fabulous. It works well when if you use it every night before bed. I can definitely see and feel a difference. Thanks for sending it to me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the way my skin feels. My face is remarkably soft and a little brighter. I have only used this product for 2 weeks and I can see an improvement. Thank you so much! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

After using this product for over a week I saw a difference in the way my skin felt and looked. This was a sample product but I would definitely buy it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
After using this for 5 nights, my skin felt a little smoother. Maybe if I use it for a longer period of time I will see further improvement. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I noticed a difference immediately. My skin was smoother and had more of a glow. I used this product only at night but I noticed no irritation in the morning. Highly recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I am on day 3 of using the micro-peel and have definitely noticed results. Skin is smother and brighter! I will continue to use!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am so pleased with this product that I went to the store and purchased more Olay products! I appreciate the gentle formula and am so glad to have started a new skincare regimen with Olay! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a great overnight exfoliant, similar to the Olay Night Resurfacing Elixir. It leaves your skin smoother in the morning than it would otherwise be. A solid product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've used the product for about 5 days now and my skin feels smoother and looks brighter. It made the skin on my neck look firmer too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have used this product for a week now, I think its great. Leaves your skin smooth. No stickiness. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I got started using it this week but my face does seem to look better, brighter and it it clearer. I'll keep using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I do think it is helping but I have only had it for a week. I am also using the daily SPF Prox lotion and a night firming cream. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Your face feels and looks smooth, clean and refreshed. Helps with acne control as well. My granddaughter and I both love this product.
This product is perfect.. i biught it in cvs in massashissets and i have no regrets..works perfect i have seen a huge change in my face..love it!
My husband bought this product for me to try and its really good for my skin. I will keep on using this product.
Left skin smooth, moist not greasy, long lasting and covered fine wrinkle lines [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have tried many products but this one is worh buying. You can actually see the difference after 3 days.
I Think It Was A Very Great Product. And Very Useful. It Helped Me A Lot. And I Would Recommend This Product For People To Use It. It Really Works !
This makes your skin feel so refreshed, especially after being outside in South Louisiana! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
If you love your face as a young woman.....you'll love your face as a grown woman [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It really works!!! My skin is too oily and i` m 44 years old! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I noticed my skin looked smoother after a week or so of using it. I'm a big fan of the pro x products and will continue to use this product
I love this product I think it works very well my face seems a little tighter [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This Olay Pro x product has improved the appearance of my skin. My skins texture is smoother. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I found that I turned red very easy from it did not notice any real changes [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Saw results with the very first use. My skin felt firm and smooth in the morning. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've been using the Pro X almost a week, and can certainly see visible improvement in my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
starting noticing increased luminosity after one week can use sparingly so lasts a long time [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It left my skin feeling soft, clean and younger looking. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've only had the product for a short time but it feels great on! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Only slightly better than olay 3in1 serum. Softer skin feel, but no visible effect on wrinkles. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love this product! After the first night I felt and saw a difference. Easy to use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Like the smooth texture of this product and doesn't cause any oiliness to my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
made my skin a bit dry but it did soften the fine lines under my eyes [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love it! I can tell the difference in my face after only one week. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Gentle to the skin - not harsh. Skin looks and feels smoother. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have been using this for only 1 week but I felt a tingle from the first use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have used it every night since I got it and I love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I'm aging so I use all oil of olay products because they seem to help
Skin is visibly smoother. It's pricey but goes a long way. Please don't discontinue this product.
Amazing! Does everything it claims and doesn't irratate my sensitive skin!
This product from Olay is a good one.
It's good for my skin.I love it.I,'m using this product
I love this product!! WHY is it being discontinued?!?!?!
JUST AN AMAZING PRODUCT WHICH EXFOLIATES MY SKIN GENTLY.
It can be a little irritating the first time you use it. After that you will see great results.
Finally a product that works as well as described.
I have see dramatic results with using this product
Saw results very quickly. Another great product ! Definitely will recommend to all my friends.
I used this product daily until the entire bottle was empty and saw no difference in my skin.
